name: Kangkong In Coconut Cream
description: Indulge in the essence of health and flavor with our Kangkong In Coconut Cream recipe. Perfect for those following a low-carb and low-sugar lifestyle, this dish combines the nutritional goodness of water spinach with the rich, creamy texture of coconut cream. Tailored for the health-conscious, this recipe promises to be a delightful addition to your healthy eating habits.
recipeIngredient: 1  tsp ground (2.3 g), Black Pepper - Ground

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the water spinach thoroughly under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and mince the garlic, then peel and finely chop the red onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat and saut√© the garlic and onion until they're softened and fragrant, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the water spinach to the pan, cook for 5 minutes until it begins to wilt.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the coconut cream, add salt and black pepper. Stir well to combine and cook for an additional 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the kangkong hot, optionally garnished with some finely chopped red pepper for color and a slight spicy kick.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
